mapper.select: /* userMenu */ -- 전체메뉴 트리 WITH W_MENU AS ( SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, PARENT_MENU_CD, URL , LEVEL AS LVL , CASE WHEN CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF = 1 AND URL IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS URL_YN , SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(MENU_CD, '>') || '>' AS PATH FROM TB_MST_MENU START WITH PARENT_MENU_CD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CD = PARENT_MENU_CD ORDER SIBLINGS BY MENU_CD ) -- 사용자 권한에 따른 메뉴코드 , W_ROLE_MENU AS ( SELECT SB.MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE SA INNER JOIN TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU SB ON SB.ROLE_CD = SA.ROLE_CD WHERE SA.USER_ID = @{userId} ) -- 사용자 권한에 따른 메뉴코드의 상위, 하위, 자신 , W_ROLE_ALL_MENU AS ( -- 순방향 전개 : 하위메뉴코드 전체 SELECT MENU_CD FROM TB_MST_MENU START WITH MENU_CD IN (SELECT MENU_CD MENU_CD FROM W_ROLE_MENU) CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CD = PARENT_MENU_CD UNION ALL -- 역방향 전개 : 상위메뉴코드 전체 SELECT MENU_CD FROM TB_MST_MENU START WITH MENU_CD IN (SELECT MENU_CD MENU_CD FROM W_ROLE_MENU) CONNECT BY MENU_CD = PRIOR PARENT_MENU_CD --ORDER SIBLINGS BY MENU_CD ) SELECT * FROM W_MENU WHERE MENU_CD IN (SELECT MENU_CD FROM W_ROLE_ALL_MENU)
